rows.label: qst101001_msg0001
rows.name:
So YOU did this?! You're the
one that broke the crane?

rows.label: qst101001_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, you didn't do it...? Well,
gee... Sorry 'bout the accusation.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0003
rows.name: Oh, curious, are you?

rows.label: qst101001_msg0004
rows.name:
That's our big important helper, the
crane... But right now the wire's
out, so it's just taking up space.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0005
rows.name:
At first I thought it just snapped
from regular wear and tear, but
actually it keeps breaking.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0006
rows.name:
I fixed it once, I fixed it
again... No use. Come morning,
it's broken again.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0007
rows.name:
The number of times it's happened,
it's hard to see it as an accident...
Truth be told, I suspect foul play.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0008
rows.name:
We gotta make up for the
work we lose with the wire
being broken, but...

rows.label: qst101001_msg0009
rows.name:
Well, without the crane,
we're not making much
headway... What's a guy to do?

rows.label: qst101001_msg0010
rows.name: What, really? Wow. You're a lifesaver!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0011
rows.name:
Okay, well, there's two
things you can do for me.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0012
rows.name:
First, help us fix the crane
so we can use it again.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0013
rows.name:
Mache, the crane operator,
is in charge of that part.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0014
rows.name: You should ask him for details.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0015
rows.name:
The other thing is...finding the
weasel who keeps messing with the
wire, and bringing them to justice!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0016
rows.name: You're on your own there, though.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0017
rows.name:
Although... Pettle, our apprentice,
is pretty keen on finding the
criminal, so maybe you can ask him?

rows.label: qst101001_msg0018
rows.name:
You can find both of 'em by the
crane. Just follow the outside
wall, you can't miss it.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0019
rows.name: A'ight, well, I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0201
rows.name: Ask Mache about fixing the crane.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0202
rows.name:
The other thing would be to find
whoever cut the crane wire, but...

rows.label: qst101001_msg0203
rows.name:
Well, ask young Pettle about
that. We're counting on you!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0301
rows.name:
You did a great job with the
crane repairs! Thanks a bunch!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0302
rows.name: Oh, but I guess that's not everything.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0303
rows.name:
Fixing the crane won't do much good if
the criminal stays at large. You never
know when he might strike again!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0304
rows.name: Good luck!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0401
rows.name:
Hey, Pettle told me
everything! So it was those
Tirkin, eh? Bloody Nora...

rows.label: qst101001_msg0402
rows.name: Oh, but I guess that's not everything.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0403
rows.name:
We don't have to worry about the wire
getting cut again, but we still can't
work unless we fix the crane.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0404
rows.name: Good luck!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0501
rows.name: Hey! I heard from Mache and Pettle!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0502
rows.name:
Those must've been some real
buff Tirkin, to cut one of
Mache's own wires like that...

rows.label: qst101001_msg0503
rows.name:
They'll probably make harder workers
than that good-for-nothing guard
Rahim, come to think of it...

rows.label: qst101001_msg0504
rows.name:
Anyhow! You took care of the
offending Tirkin, and the
crane is also now fixed!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0505
rows.name:
The Saets Lumber Co. is saved,
thanks to you! Here, I hope you'll
let us thank you properly!
